question: I am 37 years old never smoke,  experiencing shortness of breath, and my oxygen levels are decreasing when I walk (from 93 to 81 the last 6 minutes walk test).  I am a severe sleep apnea patient and asthma. Also had Diabetes Type II, fibromialgya, High Blood Pressure and Pseudo  Tumor Cerebri, what could be causing me that sintoms? Could be COPD?
title: Need Information, please
